sentences.en: I was reluctant to embroil myself in his problems.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意卷入到他的问题中去。

sentences.en: Any hostilities could result in retaliation and further embroil U.N. troops in fighting.
sentences.cn: 任何敌对活动都可能会招致报复，进而使联合国部队卷入战斗中。

sentences.en: Don't embroil me in your quarrel.
sentences.cn: 别把我牵连进你们的争吵之中。
